t: Scotts Announces Name Change to The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company; Adopts New Holding Company Structure | The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company
s: Name change coincides with the start of spring and the 2005 growing season MARYSVILLE, Ohio, March 21 /PRNewswire-FirstCall/ -- The Scotts Company today changed its name to The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company (NYSE: SMG - News) in order to raise the visibility of its key brands and more easily explain

January 30, 2025 - Entering into the pesticide industry, Scotts completed agreements for exclusive marketing rights to consumer Roundup herbicide products and for the purchase of the Ortho businesses. ... The company was renamed The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company to reflect the strength of its two leading brands.

Another significant milestone was the 1995 merger of Scotts, the leading lawn care brand, with Miracle-Gro, the leading gardening brand, to create The Scotts Miracle-Gro Company. This expansion continued in 1998, with the acquisition of Ortho®, the leading brand of gardening pesticides, and ...
